name: mama luigi evades the goombas
description:
i made this comic https://sites.google.com/view/readmamaluig

so please read the comic

in the game you run away from the goomba in 20 seconds use WASD to run

some of the project uses code from space blast

this was made made for the 20 second game jam https://itch.io/jam/20-second-game-jam
